document.docAuthor: Yakovlev, Roman V., Pljustch, Igor G., Skrylnik, Yuriy, Pak, Oleg & Witt, Thomas J.
document.masterDocTitle: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Cossidae (Lepidoptera) of Afghanistan with description of three new species and special notes on the fauna of Bande-Amir National Park

subSubSection.paragraph:
Staudinger, 1887
: 91 .

Type species:
Cossulus argentatus
Staudinger, 1887
. Designation by monotypy.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cossulus griseatellus Yakovlev, 2006
(
Figs 21−22
, 103 )
Yakovlev, 2006 b
: 14
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Type locality: NW Pakistan , Swat prov., Gabral-Tal.
Type material: holotype (male) in MNHW , examined.

Distribution: NW Pakistan , Swat prov., SO Afghanistan . Habitat and biology. Flight period: June-July. Altitude: 2100−2350 m . Material examined: male ( paratype ), SO Afghanistan , Safed Koh, Südseite, Kotkal, 2350 m , 21.06 –1.07.1969, leg. Vartian ( MNHW ).

: 346
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Type locality: Samarkand [ Uzbekistan , Samarkand].

Type material: lectotype (male) in ZISP , examined. Designation by
Yakovlev ( 2006 b)
.

Distribution: Kirgizstan , Uzbekistan , Tadzhikistan , N. Iran , Afghanistan (
Daniel 1964 b
,
1965 c
,
1969 b
,
1971
;
Yakovlev 2006 b
).

Cossulus intractatus (
Staudinger, 1887
)
(
Figs 25−26
, 105 )
Type locality: Provinz Samarkand [ Uzbekistan , Samarkand].
Type material ( syntypes ) in MHUB , examined.

Material examined:
6 males
,
1 female
, N. Afghanistan , Prov. Badakhshan, Khwahan (Darwaz), 1000 m , 11 .0 7.1972 , leg. Brade & Naumann ( MWM ).

Cossulus kabulense (
Daniel, 1965
)
(
Figs 27 −29
,
88 , 106
)
Type locality: Afghanistan , Khurd-Kabul, 30 km SO v. Kabul.
Type material: holotype (male) in MNHW (coll. E. Vartian), examined. Distribution: Afghanistan (Paghman Mts.).

Habitat and biology. Flight period: June −July. Altitude: 2100−2200 m (
Daniel 1965
). Material examined: male ( holotype ) Afghanistan , Khurd-Kabul, 30 km SO v. Kabul, 2200 m , 20.06 .–8.07.1963, Kasy & Vartian ( MNHW ); female (allotype), same data ( MNHW );
2 males
, Afghanistan , Pagman Gebirge, Kabul, 3000 m ,
Juni–Juli 1942
, coll. Brandt ( MNHS ).

Christoph, 1887
)
(

, 107 )
Type locality: Aschabad [ Turkmenistan , Ashkhabad].
Type material (cotypes) in ZISP , examined.

Cossulus turcomanica (
Christoph, 1893
)
(

Type locality: Askhabad, Pul-i-Hatum, Tekke [ Turkmenistan , Ashkhabad]. Type material: lectotype (male) in ZISP , examined. Designation by

. Distribution: Turkmenistan , N. Afghanistan , NE Iran (
Yakovlev 2006 b
).

Material examined: male, Herat, 970 m ,
5.5 . 56
., Amsel ( MWM ); male, Salang pass, Kotale, leg. Dr. Reshöft, 3200 m , 14 .0 7.72 . ( MWM );
24 males

Type locality: 40 km SW v. Kabul, Afghanistan .

970 m .

,

,

Cossulus habibae Yakovlev, Pljustch, Skrylnik & Pak
,
sp. nov.
(

, 79 ,
89 , 110
) Type locality: Afghanistan , Bamian, Band-e-Amir, Sabzel vill. Type material: holotype (male) in ZISP .
Distribution: central Afghanistan .
Habitat and biology. Flight period: July. Altitude: 2800−2900 m .
